title.rendered: DeepDrills Solutions Appoints IKM as Korea Distributor

content.rendered:
DeepDrills Solutions are pleased to announce the appointment of IKM Testing Korea LLC as its distributor in Korea.

IKM Testing Korea was established in October 2013 with office/warehouse facilities in Busan and provides a wide range of equipment and services for Topside, Subsea, Drilling, Marine and Training services, including equipment rentals. Led by Mr Youngshin Ahn PhD, the IKM Korea team hold large stocks of DeepDrills Solutionss high pressure equipment and are very experienced in the provision of engineered solutions designed around DeepDrills Solutionss extensive range of high pressure equipment.

They can be contacted directly at email YS.Ahn@kr.IKM.com and phone +82 (51) 727 90 62.
